Class BlackJackGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • BlackJackGame

  • public class BlackJackGame
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the game of blackjack

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BlackJackGame()
      Creates a new game, including creating the deck of cards and the dealer and player.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void instruct()
      Prints the instructions for users of the blackjack game
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Plays the main game
      void playHand()
      Plays the current hand.
      void reportStats()
      Prints the statistics for the player and dealer
      void resetStats()
      Resets the game statistics for both the dealer and player

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BlackJackGame

        public BlackJackGame()
        Creates a new game, including creating the deck of cards and the dealer and player.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Plays the main game

      • playHand

        public void playHand()
        Plays the current hand. It shuffles the deck, gives the player and dealer two cards each, has the player take his/her turn, and has the dealer take his/her turn. Finally, the winner is determined.

      • reportStats

        public void reportStats()
        Prints the statistics for the player and dealer

      • resetStats

        public void resetStats()
        Resets the game statistics for both the dealer and player

      • instruct

        public static void instruct()
        Prints the instructions for users of the blackjack game
